T02D2306:246b-0: @246b * // mthu can la gdams pa bzhugs /
T02D2306:246b-2: # // gdug ba tshar gcod ye shes chen po'i klong //
T02D2306:246b-3: rab 'bar 'jigs byed he ru ka la 'dud //
T02D2306:246b-4: thabs dang ldan pa rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhung //
T02D2306:246b-5: ma lus rgyal pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya //
T02D2306:246b-6: sdang ba'i sems can zhi bas mi 'dul ba //
T02D2306:246b-7: gnyen pos tshar gcod phrin las chen po'i lugs //
T02D2306:246b-8: bla ma la smod bstan la sdang sogs la //
T02D2306:246b-9: rang gzhan grol phyir bsgral pa'i sbyor ba tsam //
T02D2306:246b-10: mnyam nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor chos gun ni //
T02D2306:246b-11: ro gcig zhi bas sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras bcad //
T02D2306:246b-12: thabs ldan lcags kyus 'khor lo phung po dgug / thugs rje'i lcid mnan shes rab mtshon gyis dral //
T02D2306:246b-13: chu shing kha phye ma rig mun pa bsal //
T02D2306:246b-14: ye shes 'od kyis 'byung ba rim par sbyangs //
T02D2306:247a-2: aa h'um sbyor bas 'od kyi sems dpa'i tshul //
T02D2306:247a-3: 'og min gnas su ya yis rab tu bskul //
T02D2306:247a-4: gnyis med rgyal ba'i sras gyur rdo rje sems //
T02D2306:247a-5: rig pa'i dbang bskur gzhan don mdzad pa can //
T02D2306:247a-6: ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i dpe byad rnams kyis sbas //
T02D2306:247a-7: phung po la sogs 'byung ba dbang po rnams //
T02D2306:247a-8: mchod pa'i sprin du phyogs bcu khyab par spro //
T02D2306:247a-9: mnyam du sbyor bas de nyid nges pa yi //
T02D2306:247a-10: aa yi rang bzhin thog mtha' med pa'i nang //
T02D2306:247a-11: ta la mngon mtshon bris pa'i gzugs la blta //
T02D2306:247a-12: h'um bltas phur bus btab bskor rtsad nas bcad //
T02D2306:247a-13: phyag rgya ri snying po bdag po dgu 'das pas //
T02D2306:247a-14: go 'phang ster byed chags pas sdig pa sgrol //
T02D2306:247a-15: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa gsang ba'i thabs //
T02D2306:247a-16: dka' thub tshogs dang bral ba grub pa'i lam //
T02D2306:247a-17: nyi zla'i rtsi zin zhe sdang bde bar thim //
T02D2306:247a-18: nyon mongs dran rtog shes rab snang bar gsal //
T02D2306:247a-19: goms pa'i sbyor ba legs gzhag bstan pa yis //
T02D2306:247a-20: rten med 'dzin pa bral ba ye shes lha //
T02D2306:247a-21: mnyam par sbyor bas zag med bde ba che //
T02D2306:247a-22: gnyis 'dzin bud shing me ltar rang tshig 'gyur //
T02D2306:247a-23: de ltar shes pa'i skyes bu 'dzin pa dang //
T02D2306:247a-24: 'phel 'grib zag pa yod med la sogs pa //
T02D2306:247a-25: 'ching grol khang par sna tshogs snang ba kun //
T02D2306:247a-26: sgyu ma'i sbyor ba rgyal ba'i mdzad pas gnas //
T02D2306:247a-27: sbyor bas gdug pa ma lus bsgral bya zhing //
T02D2306:247a-28: bsgral bas skye med dbyings su nges par sbyor //
T02D2306:247a-29: dngos po dngos med 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das //
T02D2306:247a-30: spyod yul bral bas gsang ba'i lam mchog go //
T02D2306:247a-31: gnod sbyin srin po'i mthu rtsal ngan song lam //
T02D2306:247a-32: gnyis 'dzin zhen pas rang rgyud 'khor ba ste //
T02D2306:247a-33: de nyid med par grol ba srin po'i las //
T02D2306:247a-34: yang dag don la gnam sa lta bur 'gyur //
T02D2306:247a-35: thams cad rang byung byang chub sems yin pas //
T02D2306:247a-36: 'di nyid ma skyes phyogs ris cha shas bral //
T02D2306:247a-37: ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med pa yi //
T02D2306:247a-38: phrin las chen pos mi mthun dri ma sel //
T02D2306:247a-39: dgug dang bkug dang 'thab dang dgar ba dang //
T02D2306:247a-40: 'dren dang 'dzin dang 'khyil bar bya ba ste //
T02D2306:247b-0: sbyangs dang spel ba'i las la legs brtsams @247b pas //
T02D2306:247b-1: rgyun chad med pa'i bde ba chen por 'gyur //
T02D2306:247b-2: gsang mchog theg la dbyings la rab tu rdzogs //
T02D2306:247b-3: phyi nang snod bcud ye shes chen po'i sku //
T02D2306:247b-4: gang gis dpag par mi nus bsam las 'das //
T02D2306:247b-5: rang byung mtha' dbus mad pa snying po'i gsang //
T02D2306:247b-6: dbang po dman dang rtog ge'i yul min zhing //
T02D2306:247b-7: gang du 'ching ba'i las la spyad pas kyang //
T02D2306:247b-8: de nyid grol ba'i mchog ster rgyal sras lam //
T02D2306:247b-9: 'phro 'du med pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2306:247b-10: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tilli pas /
T02D2306:247b-11: gyad kyi nor bu'i grong du mthu can la gdams
